title: The way i rate movies
review:
Its simple how i rate movies, if it's worth watching i give it at least 7 stars.
This movie was far from it, i mean it was BORING !
It was 164 minutes of misery and dullness, this movie made me feel nothing.

title: BORING
review:
I kept watching the movie for an hour hoping it will get better, i gave up!
Directing and acting was so BORING

title: Overrated
review:
• This is an average movie, maybe less.
  • Quite boring as i was waiting the whole time for it to get a bit more exciting but it never did
  • Average acting
  • Its one of those movies when its about to finish and you realize that nothing had happened yet !
  • Based on the ratings and reviews i was expecting to see a much better movie .
  • The plot is too simple,(SPOILER ALERT) Humans can't have babies anymore,for some reason we're in London and the government is kicking none natives out, a baby for an immigrant was born, then escaped on a boat named tomorrow. aaand that's about it
  • Highly over rated
